frontmatter.title: put Get MFA factors information
frontmatter.description: Returns information about the auth factors of the current user and refreshes the related session claim

frontmatter.title: get List TOTP devices
frontmatter.description: List the TOTP devices of the current user

frontmatter.title: post Create TOTP device
frontmatter.description: Creates an unverified totp device

frontmatter.title: post Remove TOTP device
frontmatter.description: Removes a totp device

frontmatter.title: post Verify TOTP device
frontmatter.description: Checks that the TOTP sent in the body belongs to the totp device (specified by deviceName, belonging to the session user)

frontmatter.title: post Verify TOTP code
frontmatter.description: Checks that the TOTP sent in the body belongs to a verified totp device of the session user

frontmatter.title: post Start passwordless sign in/up
frontmatter.description: Start sign in/up process with passwordless

frontmatter.title: post Resend passwordless code
frontmatter.description: Resend passwordless code

frontmatter.title: post Complete passwordless sign in/up
frontmatter.description: Finish sign in/up process with passwordless

frontmatter.title: get Check email exists (deprecated)
frontmatter.description:
Check if an email exists
Note that there is an invisible character at the end of the path, this was to avoid a conflict with the OpenAPI spec.

frontmatter.title: get Check email exists
frontmatter.description: Check if an email exists

frontmatter.title: get Check phone exists (deprecated)
frontmatter.description: Check if a phone number exists

frontmatter.description: Logout user

frontmatter.description: Reset a password using password reset token

frontmatter.title: post Sign in/up with third party
frontmatter.description: Signin/up a user

frontmatter.title: get Get third party auth URL
frontmatter.description: Get the thirdparty provider's authorisation URL to which the user should be redirected to.

frontmatter.title: get Get enabled login methods
frontmatter.description: Get enabled login methods: Returns recipes with their enabled setting and recipe specific configuration.

frontmatter.title: post Handle Apple sign in
frontmatter.description: Handles sign in with the apple.

frontmatter.title: post Send email verification
frontmatter.description: Send email verification email

frontmatter.title: post Verify email address
frontmatter.description: Verify an email

frontmatter.title: get Check email verification status
frontmatter.description: Checks if an email is verified and adds this information into the access token payload as well

frontmatter.title: get Get JWT keys
frontmatter.description: Get all JSON web keys for JWT verification

frontmatter.title: get Get OpenID config
frontmatter.description: Get OpenID discovery configuration

frontmatter.title: get Continue OAuth login
frontmatter.description: Continues the OAuth2 login flow after the login page

frontmatter.title: get Start OAuth login
frontmatter.description: Starts the OAuth2 login flow - for a detailed description of all input parameters please see the OAuth2 and OpenID Connect Core specs

frontmatter.title: post Exchange OAuth grant
frontmatter.description: Exchanges an OAuth2 grant (e.g.: authorization code) for an access token (and optionally a refresh/id token) - for a detailed description of all input parameters please see the OAuth2 and OpenID Connect Core specs

frontmatter.title: get Get OAuth user info
frontmatter.description: Retrieves user information based on the access token passed in the authorization header

frontmatter.title: post Revoke OAuth token
frontmatter.description: Revokes an access/refresh token - the client id and secret can also be provided in an authorization header using the Basic scheme

frontmatter.title: post Introspect OAuth token
frontmatter.description: Introspects an access/refresh token

frontmatter.title: post End OAuth session
frontmatter.description: Redirects the user to a page where they can log out and revoke the oauth tokens - for a detailed description of input parameters please see the user initiated logout spec

frontmatter.title: get /{apiBasePath}/oauth/end_session
frontmatter.description: Redirects the user to a page where they can log out and revoke the oauth tokens

frontmatter.title: get Get OAuth login info
frontmatter.description: Retrieves information about the OAuth2 login

frontmatter.title: post Logout OAuth user
frontmatter.description: Logs out the user and revokes the access/refresh tokens based on the id_token_hint passed to the end_session endpoint

frontmatter.title: get /example
frontmatter.description: API endpoint in your application, checked with `verifySession`

frontmatter.description: Get WebAuthn registration options for a user
